testCases.title: System Infrastructure Setup Verification
testCases.description: Verify the proper setup and functioning of the infrastructure for the CRM/Call Center System.

steps.stepDescription: Precondition: Ensure all required infrastructure components are available and properly configured.
steps.expectedResult: All components are available and configured.

steps.stepDescription: Access the CRM/Call Center System.
Verify the availability and responsiveness of the system.
steps.expectedResult: The system is accessible and responds promptly to user interactions.

steps.stepDescription: Test the connectivity between the CRM/Call Center System and the necessary databases or external systems.
steps.expectedResult: The system establishes a stable and reliable connection with the databases and external systems.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the functionality of any hardware components (e.g., servers, network devices) involved in the system.
steps.expectedResult: The hardware components operate properly and support the required system functionalities.

steps.stepDescription: Test system performance under normal conditions (e.g., user load, data volume).
steps.expectedResult: The system performs efficiently and provides a smooth user experience without delays or errors.

steps.stepDescription: Conduct system backup and restoration procedures.
steps.expectedResult: Data backup and restoration processes are successful, ensuring data integrity and availability.

steps.stepDescription: Validate disaster recovery mechanisms (if applicable).
steps.expectedResult: The system recovers from potential disasters and ensures minimal data loss and downtime.

testCases.title: Contact Management Feature Testing
testCases.description: Validate the contact management features of the CRM/Call Center System.

steps.stepDescription: Access the contact management section of the CRM/Call Center System.
Create a new contact record with all relevant details.
Search for an existing contact using various criteria.
Update an existing contact's information.
Link a contact to a company or organization.
steps.expectedResult: Contact is linked correctly to the company.

steps.stepDescription: Associate activities and interactions with a contact.
steps.expectedResult: Activities are properly associated with the contact.

steps.stepDescription: Create and manage contact groups or lists.

testCases.title: Customer Contact Details Storage Validation
testCases.description: Ensure accurate storage and retrieval of customer contact details.

steps.stepDescription: Create a new customer record.
Click the Walk-in Activity button, then click New Contact.
Enter valid customer contact details (Full Name, Email, Phone, Address).
Save the customer record.
Retrieve the customer record.
Verify stored customer contact details.
steps.expectedResult: Contact details match the entered information.

testCases.title: Customer Information Management Verification
testCases.description: Validate the functionality of updating and deleting customer information.

steps.stepDescription: Retrieve an existing customer record from the system.
Update the customer contact details with new information.
Save the updated customer record.
Retrieve the updated customer record from the system.
steps.expectedResult: Updated customer record is retrieved accurately.

steps.stepDescription: Verify that the updated customer contact details are accurate.
steps.expectedResult: Contact details match the updated information.

steps.stepDescription: Delete the customer record from the system.
Attempt to retrieve the deleted customer record.
steps.expectedResult: Deleted customer record is not found in the system.

testCases.title: Customer Interaction Linkage Verification
testCases.description: Ensure proper linking of customer interactions to respective customer records.

steps.stepDescription: Retrieve an existing customer record from the system.
Initiate a customer interaction, such as a phone call, email, or chat.
Record the details of the customer interaction.
Link the recorded customer interaction to the respective customer record.
steps.expectedResult: Customer interaction is linked to the customer record.

steps.stepDescription: Retrieve the customer record and verify the presence of the linked interaction.
steps.expectedResult: Linked interaction is found in the customer record.

steps.stepDescription: Retrieve the linked interaction and verify that the details are accurate.
steps.expectedResult: Linked interaction details match the recorded information.

testCases.title: Customer Segmentation Capabilities Validation
testCases.description: Validate the customer segmentation and targeting capabilities.

steps.stepDescription: Access the customer segmentation tools.
Create customer segments based on various criteria (demographics, behavior).
Save the defined customer segments.
Create targeted marketing campaigns for specific segments.
steps.expectedResult: Targeted campaigns are set up successfully.

steps.stepDescription: Verify segment analytics and reporting.

testCases.title: Lead Creation and Assignment Testing
testCases.description: Validate the creation and assignment of leads to sales representatives.

steps.stepDescription: Create a new lead in the system.
Enter valid lead details in the input fields.
Assign the lead to a sales representative.
steps.expectedResult: Lead is successfully assigned to the sales representative.

steps.stepDescription: Save the assigned lead.
Retrieve the assigned lead from the system.
Verify that the assigned lead details are accurate.
steps.expectedResult: Lead details match the entered information.

testCases.title: Lead to Opportunity Conversion Validation
testCases.description: Verify the process of converting leads to opportunities.

steps.stepDescription: Retrieve an existing lead from the system.
Convert the lead to an opportunity.
steps.expectedResult: Lead is successfully converted to an opportunity.

steps.stepDescription: Enter opportunity details in the input fields.
Save the converted opportunity.
Retrieve the opportunity from the system.
Verify that the opportunity details are accurate and linked to the lead.
steps.expectedResult: Opportunity details match the entered information and are linked to the lead.

testCases.title: Sales Pipeline Tracking and Management Testing
testCases.description: Verify the system's ability to track and manage sales pipelines.

steps.stepDescription: Create a new opportunity in the system.
Move the opportunity through different pipeline stages.
Update opportunity details at each stage.
Generate pipeline reports.
Verify pipeline analytics and forecasting.
